snippet: The center is a temporary shelter for refugees before they are moved to a camp called Zaatari, which has been battered by a flash flood.
abstract: Officials in Jordan say fire caused by kerosene heater that flipped over in center for Syrian refugees kills seven members of a family.
lead_paragraph: The center is a temporary shelter for refugees before they are moved to a camp called Zaatari, which has been battered by a flash flood.

headline.main: Jordan: Fire Kills Family at Camp for Syrian Refugees
headline.print_headline: Jordan: Fire Kills Family at Camp for Syrian Refugees
